Question: Describe the shortest sequence of actions that lets you harvest 5 Gold and 3 Elan from Windup Man next Collect step.
Answer: (1) Use Windup Man’s power twice this round to add 2 Gold and 1 Elan; (2) Do not remove any tokens; at next Collect it adds +2 Gold +2 Elan, totalling 5 Gold 3 Elan.
Rationale: Leaving tokens triggers +2 per Collect; two activations add requisite amounts.:contentReference[oaicite:64]{index=64}:contentReference[oaicite:65]{index=65}
